Context:
The text provides information on the benefits of living in residence at George Brown College for International students. The following are factual information and entities extracted from the text:

* George Brown College
* Toronto as a city with lots to see and do
* Living in residence offers opportunity for personal growth, new friendships, social events, volunteer opportunities, etc.
* Avoiding hassles of furnishing apartment, finding roommate, splitting monthly bills, commuting to class, dealing with landlords, setting up internet/television and phone service
* Residence Life team hosts student activities and events daily (cooking classes, movie nights, Blue Jays Baseball games, scavenger hunts)
* Early Move-In Orientation for developing friendships and learning about the community
* Contact information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca
* Social Media Hub link provided twice
* Information subject to change without notice
* Students responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
